name: Bone Home
description:
Note: Bone Home was developed in approximately 16 hours per participant over one week as part of Akupara Games' internal game jam for 2021.

Don't you just hate it when you wake up and can't remember where you put your femur? No? Never had that happen to you? Well, now you can see what it feels like in Bone Home, where you take on the role of a skeleton whose bones have been scattered all across the graveyard.

Help Shelton the Skeleton collect themselves so they can be whole again!

But it might not be as easy as you think - after all, putting a skeleton back together again is no simple feet.

Features

  • 2D top-down kinetic puzzles.
  • Fun soundtrack.
  • Brain-bending gameplay!
